name: Kasawari Lembeh Resort

reviews.text: Kasawari is in general a very nice place. That was my very first trip to Lember straits but now I can compare it to KBR and hopefully soon will also add a comparison review of Lembeh Resort. Those three are considered "the best and the most expensive hotels of the straits". Kasawari is actually the most expensive, correct me if I'm wrong
reviews.title: If they had better food I'd live there

aka: Kasawari Lembeh Resort Bitung, Indonesia - Sulawesi
